column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This place was really quite good for the price. The service was a little slow
column2: but it was quite busy. The deep dish pizzas were a little soggy
column3: but if you like a lot of tomato sauce then you'll probably like it. The Buff-a-Lou wings
column5: were really bangin. Better than the pizza in my opinion. Our waitress was really sweet
